amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following: SEC.__.APPLICATION OF 14TH AMENDMENT. Nothing in the Act shall relieve a Native Hawaiian governing authority from complying with the equal protection clause of the 14th amendment to the United States Constitution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 111-413 to the Abercrombie amendment in the nature of a substitute to state that nothing in the Act shall relieve a Native Hawaiian governing authority from complying with the equal protection clause of the 14th amendment to the United States Constitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 177 - 233 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Flake to the Abercrombie amendment (A001).

Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 177 - 233 (Roll no. 57).
